description.originalText:
We are so lucky to have found Caroline! She has watched our kids for 3 years now and my kids love her. She is super reliable, fun, and goes above and beyond with our kids.

She's also super helpful around the house, which has been a lifesaver for us. It’s clear she genuinely cares about our kids, and they feel comfortable and safe with her, which means the world to us. I couldn’t recommend Caroline enough for any family looking for someone caring, trustworthy, and great with kids!

5/5 stars - An absolute gem!

Caroline has been an absolute blessing for our family. As a nanny for our two young children, she has exceeded every expectation we had and more. From the moment we met Caroline, we knew she was special - her warm demeanor, kind eyes, and gentle way with the children immediately put us at ease.

Caroline's reliability and punctuality have been a rock for our family. We never worry when she's with the kids - we know they're in the best hands possible. She's proactive, anticipating needs and solving problems before they even arise. Her communication is outstanding; we always know exactly how the children's day was, from their adorable antics to their meals and naps.

But what truly sets Caroline apart is the depth of her love and care for the children. She doesn't just "watch" them - she actively engages with them, playing, teaching, and showering them with affection. Our children adore her, and their little faces light up the moment she walks in the door. We've seen incredible growth in their social skills and confidence since Caroline started caring for them.

We feel so fortunate to have Caroline in our lives. She's more than just a nanny - she's a part of our family. If you're lucky enough to have the opportunity to have her care for your children, seize it! Your little ones will thrive under her guidance and love.
